D.name: Dominance
D.title: The Director
D.description: You are direct, decisive, and driven. You focus on accomplishing goals, getting results, and overcoming challenges. You value competency, action, concrete results, and personal freedom.
challenges: Can be too direct or controlling
D.workStyle: You work quickly and efficiently, focusing on the big picture. You prefer autonomy and direct communication.

I.name: Influence
I.title: The Socializer
I.description: You are outgoing, enthusiastic, and optimistic. You enjoy interacting with others and tend to be persuasive. You value social recognition, group activities, and relationships.
I.workStyle: You thrive in collaborative, people-oriented environments. You prefer variety and social interaction in your work.

S.name: Steadiness
S.title: The Supporter
S.description: You are patient, loyal, and reliable. You prefer cooperation over competition and value harmony, stability, and supporting others. You are an excellent team player.
S.workStyle: You work at a steady pace and prefer stable, predictable environments. You excel at creating consensus and supporting team members.

C.name: Conscientiousness
C.title: The Analyzer
C.description: You are analytical, systematic, and precise. You focus on accuracy, quality, and logical thinking. You value expertise, competency, and attention to detail.
C.workStyle: You work methodically and precisely, focusing on quality and accuracy. You prefer clear expectations and time to analyze before acting.
